wikipedia_page.main: Evan Roberts (19 September 1861 – 16 October 1927) was a Welsh international rugby union player who played club rugby for Llanelli and international rugby for Wales.

response: *Evan Roberts (botanist) (1909–1991), botanist, conservationist and mountain man
*Evan Roberts (minister) (1878–1951), figure in the 1904–1905 Welsh Revival
*Evan Roberts (radio personality) (born 1983), American sports radio personality
